reviewText: I purchase this for an older lady in a nursing home. She loved it. Her direct tv has no Catholic stations.
Having attended this event it was good to relive it. Good quality video, actually better than I expected. The only thing I could not relive was the really cold rain.
Good pictures of Pope John Paul.  The middle of the video lost focus and jumped  frames which was disappointing.
The  mass, music and ceremony was much more than I expected.
My most cherished Pope John Paul 11 is captured on DVD. This is a must for those who love now Saint John  Paul
The video messed up at communion time when cameraman videoed the floor more than once  Loved seeing the Pope, none the less.
